thread.title: Pittsburg man charged w/ unlawful physical contact of a student
thread.title_full: Pittsburg man charged w/ unlawful physical contact of a student - FOX 14 TV Joplin and Pittsburg News Weather Sports |

author: cbs8
title: Pittsburg man charged w/ unlawful physical contact of a student
text:
CRAWFORD COUNTY, KANSAS - Mathew DeMoss is charged with unlawful physical contact with a student when done in a rude, insulting or angry manner. The charge spanned from an incident that occurred January 2015.
According to court documents, DeMoss entered a plea guilty. His jail sentence was suspended, but will be under unsupervised probation for one year. DeMoss must write a letter of apology to the victim within 30 days.
